data.name: Peach roblox wallpaper theme !
metacafe Dark by BamaBraves
Habitica Phobia Protection
data.description:
For the Habitica website (habitica.com), this hides Pets, Mounts, Quest Bosses, Equipment, and Backgrounds that display creatures that can trigger phobias, and also animated items which can be distracting.

You must select the creatures you want to hide before you install the extension using the "Advanced Style Settings" button below. To change your selections, delete the style and reinstall it.

It does not hide Pet Eggs or Quest scrolls (except where otherwise indicated) since those usually don't display clear images of the animals. 

Email me at lady_alys@oldgods.net to have other types of creatures added or if you find that the existing settings don't hide all the items they should. If you don't hear back from me within a week, please email me again.

When an avatar uses one of the hidden backgrounds, the extension hides the full avatar, not just the background.

Habitica wiki page: http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Phobia_Protection_Extension

data.name: YouTube Black - KMV
data.description:
Black YouTube Theme by KMV.

Consider this theme "Clean".
Most colours are B/W until hovered.
Designed to be easy on the eyes - most distractions have been reduced to a minimum.
Works straight out of the box - no "Enable YouTube Dark Theme" again.

Note:
I do not have a YT account, so there are likely elements within user account-pages not covered.

Features custom cursors, -scrollbars, subtle opacities and gradients, hover transitions on Menus, Buttons, Logos and Popups.
Dark Theme on reCAPTCHA & YouTube Login page included.

All options in separate codes. Delete any of these to disable.

Main Player is untouched to accommodate for the many custom interfaces available.

Optional Video Dim (-25% brightness);
https://userstyles.org/styles/175380/


Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact;
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/

data.name: Classic YouTube Dark Updated
data.description: this is a fork of Amir Torrez's Classic YouTube Dark, which is a fork of YouTube Dark Grey, with some changes and fixes for more pleasant viewing you will need the old YouTube design for this to work! please install an extension like Good Old YouTube: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/good-old-youtube/ (also available for Chrome) notice a problem? something not themed correctly? contact help@carsuki.moe. please don't contact me on userstyles.org if you can avoid it—this site is crumbling and I don't enjoy navigating the ancient forum/messaging system. the changes are described in further detail below.

data.name: Vanilla Dark 2 VK Fix/Mod PART 2 of 2

read description and set all style settings there
